did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Photographs, articles, lecture notes, memorabilia, correspondence, tape recordings, programs, material on professorial exchanges, and announcements.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Historical material relating to the Chemistry Department includes photographs (including prints, and glass and film slides), articles, lecture notes, memorabilia, correspondence, tape recordings, programs, material on professorial exchanges, and announcements.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Historical material relating to the Chemistry Department includes photographs (including prints, and glass and film slides), articles, lecture notes, memorabilia, correspondence, tape recordings, programs, material on professorial exchanges, and announcements; also, photographs documenting the construction of Baker Laboratory; and a history of the department by Emile Chamot and Fred H. Rhodes.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Department of Chemistry Records, #14-8-2535. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: Not all the material in the collection is covered by this guide.
